GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article object that corresponds to the article ID'

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments that correspond to the given article ID''

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Inserts the new comment into the database and serves the posted comment object

exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments or decrements the number of votes for the specific article ID, by the number sent in the request, and then serves the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment corresponding to the given comment ID, and responds with 204 and no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
